timeline.bodyText: @nsivabalan : I had earlier suggested this to unblock debugging. Can you see why data-node is coming up occasionally ?
timeline.author: bvaradar

replies.bodyText: I didn't see this in the last 30 odd runs. So, gonna be tough to repro.
replies.author: nsivabalan

timeline.message: Commenting out testsuite tests from Integration tests until we investigate the CI flakiness

timeline.bodyText: can we clean up these s.o.p?
timeline.author: vinothchandar

replies.bodyText: this was useful in general while checking the Integ tests log output. If not for this, it wasn't easy to understand where the tests fails if tests hung or terminated half way if not for explicit exception. I prefer to keep this actually.
replies.author: nsivabalan

replies.bodyText: no I meant, why not log.info() or something?
replies.author: vinothchandar

replies.bodyText: We should look into why these thing are not being logged now. they showed up for sure before
replies.author: vinothchandar

replies.bodyText: you are right. I do see all commands are already logged. my bad.
replies.author: nsivabalan
